alert.note: Alert for Mahoning; Portage; Trumbull (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 25 at 1:56AM EDT until July 25 at 3:00AM EDT by NWS Cleveland
info.description: The National Weather Service in Cleveland has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Portage County in northeastern Ohio... Southeastern Trumbull County in northeastern Ohio... Mahoning County in northeastern Ohio... * Until 300 AM EDT. * At 156 AM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Sharpsville to near Alliance, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and power lines. * Locations impacted include... Youngstown, Warren, Columbiana, Boardman, Niles, Campbell, Hubbard, Canfield, Lordstown, Vienna Center, Hilltop, Maplewood Park, Austintown, Struthers, Girard, Vienna, McDonald, Poland, Ellsworth and New Middletown. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 700 AM EDT for northeastern Ohio. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 700 AM EDT for northeastern Ohio.
